sentences.en: Borrowing $100,000 is one thing. Owing $425,000 is another!
sentences.cn: 借10万美元事儿小，欠42.5万美元这事可就大了。

sentences.en: He could take what was owing for the rent.
sentences.cn: 他可以把自己欠的钱抵作对方的租金。
他付清了所有应付的钱.

sentences.en: He tends to be romantic owing to lack of experience.
sentences.cn: 由于缺乏经验,他有浪漫主义的倾向.

sentences.en: He was out of work owing to a physical injury.
his reading was hesitant owing to a stammer.
sentences.cn: 由于口吃他朗读时结结巴巴的。

sentences.en: It was altogether owing it to himself that James won the prize.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯获奖完全是靠自己的努力.

sentences.en: Owing to a previous engagement, I shan't be able to come.
sentences.cn: 因事先另有约会, 我无法前来.

sentences.en: Owing to little response, his speech tailed off to a hesitant end.
sentences.cn: 由于得不到多少反应, 他的演说吞吞吐吐地收了场.

sentences.en: Owing to the rain, the match was canceled.
sentences.cn: 因为下雨, 比赛取消了.

sentences.en: Owing to the state of the ground, the match has been put off.
sentences.cn: 由于场地状况不佳, 比赛推迟了.

sentences.en: Results have been delayed owing to a malfunction in the computer.
sentences.cn: 由于电脑发生故障,计算结果推迟了.

sentences.en: Some impatience was exhibited owing to the non - arrival of the speaker.
sentences.cn: 由于讲演人未到,听众显得有些不耐烦.

sentences.en: The game was cancelled owing to torrential rain.
There are still ten dollars owing.
There was still ten dollars owing.
You need to pay the amount owing, plus the interest.
sentences.cn: 你需要付清欠款，外加利息。

words.tran_cn: 欠；感激；应给予；应该把……归功于

trans.tran_en: if money is owing, it has not yet been paid to the person who should receive it

trans.tran_cn: 感激( owe的现在分词 )，应把…归功于，欠…债，（对位高权重者）忠诚
